channel.title: electron on An old coder
channel.description: Recent content in electron on An old coder

item.title: A New Project
item.description: So my current project is coming to a close and I am on the lookout for a new one to start working on. My current obsession is a game called Conquest of Elysium 5 and it has a modding system that is simple enough that even an old coot like myself can partake. The code for the mods is created in a single text file and all of the images used are in .
